title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.3 - Appointment of attorneys for children in Family Court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.3 - Appointment of attorneys for children in Family Court

State Regulations

Where for sufficient reason attorneys
for children to be appointed pursuant to the Family Court Act, section 249, cannot otherwise be designated as provided in section 243(a) of such act, the
court may draw upon such panels as have been established by the assigned
counsel plan for the First Judicial Department as if such panels had been
separately established pursuant to section 243(c) of such
act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
611.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
